properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O premagala yesu preminchi naavu mammu Smarinchuchu stutintun rakshana nitchinaavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adbutha yaagamandu andarikai baliyai Andari paapamulaku praayshchiththa maitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daasulamai me munda moshenu pampitivi Chesitivi swatantrulugaa nee baahu balamu thoda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kshamaapanaanandamutho saagimpajesi mammu Yaatralo maaku thodai vijayamu nitchitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Edaari adavi Iona ootala nadulu nadipi endina Nela nantha patchika bayalu chesen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baabelu nundi mammu vidipinchitivi neevu Bandhakamula thenchi thappu bodha baapinaavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sahavaasa mitchi sangha angamula jesinaavu Saakshulanu chesi mammu shatruvula sigguparache{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahaa premagala yesu maakai chesitivarnni Ghana parathu Halleluya ee goppa rakshana koraku{/lang-eng}
